text: The first season of Philippines' Next Top Model aired from March 13, 2007 to June 12, 2007 on RPN. The international destinations for this season was Victoria, Hong Kong. The winner of the competition was 22-year old Grendel Alvarado from Arayat, Pampanga. ==Prizes== * Modeling representation with Starz Modeling Agency in Hong Kong * 500.000 pesos in cash courtesy of Mane and Tail Shampoo * An 8-page fashion editorial in Preview magazine * A 150.000 pesos contract with Saga Events * A one-year endorsement contract from Celine group of companies * Local advertorials campaign for L’Oreal Paris for one year * A one-year body contouring program from Marie France * A one-year complimentary treatment from Facial Care Center * A natural golden South Sea pearl necklace from Jewelmer and the title of “Jewelmer’s Pearl Ambassador to the World.” ==Cast== ===Contestants=== (Ages stated are at start of contest)https://web.archive.org/web/20070314171701/http://www.philnexttopmodel.com/cycle1.html {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; ! the pool of 27 semi-finalists was reduced to 14 who moved on to the main competition. However, this first call-out does not reflect their performance that first week. * A double elimination was conducted during the first episode. * Call-out averages of remaining contestants: Grendel Alvarado- 3.5 & Rina Lorilla- 4.0 * Episode 11 was a recap episode. * In episode 10 & 13, there was no elimination. ==References== ==External links== * Official website (archive at the Wayback Machine) Category:Top Model series Category:2007 Philippine television seasons
